name: Granite Hill
description: This is a huge hill made of granite. There are no bathrooms and no running water.

name: Starry Night Bluff
description: Breathtaking views of the night sky. Outhouses available. No running water.

name: Lake Golden Oak
description: Camp right on Lake Golden Oak. Swimming, boating, fishing, and more. Running water.
